website_summaries.verdict: This memory foam pillow cushions and supports your baby's head and it won't irritate sensitive skin.
pros: Supports your baby's head and keeps it in alignment with the spine
Made of soft, bamboo memory foam that's never been treated with chemicals so it's safe for sensitive skin
cons: The pillow has a strong smell when you first take it out of the packaging

customer_reviews.title: VERY Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: My 2-month-old daughter was developing a flat spot on the right side of her head. We’d been trying repositioning and more tummy time to help. We were just so worried that it wasn’t going to be enough, and didn’t want her to end up in a helmet if we could avoid it. We have used this pillow for THREE NIGHTS, as well as anytime she’ll be on her back for an extended period of time (like naps or playtime), and I can already see and feel a difference! I am so relieved that it’s working I could cry. I am extremely happy with the decision to try this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: TXSuzie

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a good little pillow. We haven’t gone back to the dr yet so I can’t comment on whether or not this has helped with reshaping my daughter’s head but it doesn’t bother her at all to lay in it. I was worried she wouldn’t like the feel under her head, but she has been fine with it. I will update once we go back to the dr to see if the pillow helped!
customer_reviews.author: AbbeyC

customer_reviews.title: I think this actually helped!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my daughter refused to do tummy time and would not shift her head at all, and she also would only sleep in a rock n play for the first several months, so she developed a flat spot. I started putting this under her head when she was on her play mat and any time she later flat during supervised time, and I started to notice the flat spot becoming less noticeable. I’d say that if even you use this for prevention any time baby is flat it is worth the money. A definite must have for us.
customer_reviews.author: Rylikethebread

customer_reviews.title: Really surprised with this pillow, definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves sleeping with this pillow! I was surprised how comfortable it is. She usually tosses and turns throughout the night. While using this pillow she has slept for 9 hours straight through and looked comfortable as could be. The design of the pillow is great when she turns over and sleeps face down as well. I highly recommend this pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Good but a bit too small
customer_reviews.text: We got this pillow for our two months old as his head has become pretty flat from all the sleeping on his back. It feels very nice (memory foam) and he accepts it. However, it could be bigger. It is perfect for the stroller and his head stays on it but during the night, he slipped off of it and I had to put his head back on it a couple times. I would recommend it for babies with smaller heads. His head circumference is (10 weeks) 40.3cm and it is a bit too small. Overall a good pillow though that hopefully helps to get his head a bit more back in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My baby love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: My baby love this pillow. We use this at our diaper changing station and sometimes when he sleeps on the bassinet. Baby has a perfect round head 3mos old now. We bought it when he was a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Park

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My little girl was diagnosed with torticollis and developed a noticeable flat spot due to favoring turning one way. I purchased this pillow after a bit of research and couldn’t be more thrilled! 2 months after her diagnosis the flat spot has completely rounded back out and I truly believe this pillow helped a ton! I will say it does smell right out of the package but I let it sit in the sun for a few hours and it went away. Once baby is wiggling around in their crib it becomes pretty pointless but she did use it for a solid 6 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Tasz

customer_reviews.title: Sized for newborns
customer_reviews.text: This item is way smaller than I expected. It’s more suitable for a newborn’s head size. It also comes with a chemical smell. I tried to wash it and set it out to dry, but it wouldn’t dry even after a few days. I had to throw it out once I discovered black spots popping up on it. I never even used it.
customer_reviews.author: ShopsOnlineTooMuch

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son is almost 4 months old and I started to notice a small amount of flattening due to his preferred sleeping position. I bought this and he loves it. I do a combination of more tummy time and using this pillow while he is laying flat or in his carseat for short durations such as in travel system at a store etc. It's too soon to see a difference but will update my review in about 3-4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Nayyirah

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that in conjunction with a good plan to keep baby off his back at all times, this pillow worked! I completely ceased using the bouncer, I raised the stroller to highest position and always use the pillow, use it for short trips in the car seat. All his activities are now on his tummy or upright. I even use this pillow for diaper changes and dressing. Only downside I can see is that it’s white and we all know what happens to anything white around a baby!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Washing ruined pillow
customer_reviews.text: Washing ruined this pillow. It says it’s machine washable, but most definitely is not. Daughter spit up all over pillow and it became hard, so I washed it like the package said. It came out misshapen and heavy. Even tried drying it in the dryer. Pillow was ruined and daughter didn’t like it anymore as it was no longer soft. It did seem to be a great product so I was really upset that I had to buy another so quickly. Would be great if you had a waterproof cover for this.
customer_reviews.author: C2

customer_reviews.title: Great for floor, not carseat
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised at how well this pillow actually works. I am in medicine (ENT), and our son's pediatrician noticed that he was starting to get a slight flat spot around 3 months of age. After researching, I purchased this to use on the floor and a different type of pillow to use in the bassinet and car seat. It has now been 1-2 months, and there is a visible difference in the shape of his head. Professionally, I can't even feel a flat spot now. This pillow is excellent while he is flat on his back, not well designed for use in the carseat or a snugabunny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps a lot to your baby's head's shape
customer_reviews.text: My 2 month son had little flat head on his left side, we were really worry since he won't stay asleep on the opposite side he was always turning his head to his left side, I wasn't sleeping good just because I had to check hes sleeping on the right side. Pediatric aadvisd this pillow to us and we decided to give it a try, it passed 2 months and he still sleeps on his left side with this pillow but his head is better the flat on his left side is not there anymore. I used it all the time even for his car sit and naps. Now I can rest much better without worrying about his head.
customer_reviews.author: jessenia

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective and damaged
customer_reviews.text: So not buy this product. It does not work. It also arrived in a damaged box and appeared to have been used previously. This is meant for a new born baby fresh from the womb. And only when they are sleeping. Even the slightest head turn makes the baby’s head roll off the pillow. Ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: Spoiler

customer_reviews.title: Working!
customer_reviews.text: My son has flat head on one side of his head which has caused his skull to shift. We got this pillow to help “fix” that. We have been using it for two weeks along with some exercises that the doctor gave us, and there is already some improvement. Be VERY cautious if you baby can roll over though. We only use it when he is in his swing or car seat in order to be safe. It’s a tad thinner than I was expecting, but since we are seeing results, I can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa121

customer_reviews.title: Yes & No
customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking I’d use it for my daughter but she slips off of it too much and doesn’t stay on it. Also while using this in her car seat or swing it wedges her head too much and kinks her neck. I can’t use it because it looks too uncomfortable for her. Good thing it was horribly expensive otherwise I would have regretted this purchase 100%. It is VERY soft and memory foam-like but hard to get her to stay on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Get this if your little one is getting a flat spot!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this!!!! My 6 week old started getting a flat spot, so I did some research and found this. He’s almost 8 weeks old and already sleeping on the other side of his head and I can tell the flatness is going away!! I also baby wear more, but this has definitely helped! It’s super soft, easy to clean and my LO doesn’t mind using it! It’s also so affordable! Saved us from getting a orthotic helmet I think!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah St Clair

customer_reviews.title: Keep it round, not flat!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter who is expecting her 1st child in October. She said this pillow is small, but breathable. She likes that the material is the soft memory foam material. As a first time mom she is very worried about flat head syndrome on her baby. She does wish this came with a cover of some sort, but thinks it will be easy enough to clean if it gets dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Keene Family

customer_reviews.title: Baby hated it
customer_reviews.text: My baby hated having the pillow under his head. He always screamed and fought the pillow. He is still a newborn but slept much better without the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Ryszard Dyrek

customer_reviews.title: Great memory foam baby pillow
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the product for my newborn, haven’t had a chance to use it yet since he is still in his bassinet. Plan to use it when he transitions to his crib in a few months. The product looks to be great quality and memory foam material. No weird chemical smell when opened the package. The only downside is the pillow may be difficult to clean if your baby tend to spit up during sleep or naps. Not big deal though, I ordered 2 pillows and this one is definitely seems more appropriate for newborn and babies, as it’s lower and wouldn’t strain the baby’s neck.
customer_reviews.author: Joolie

customer_reviews.title: Too small for 4 month old. Rolls off of it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s soft but reallyyy small. I bought it for my 4.5 month old and he rolls off of it all the time when he’s sleeping. He sleeps in a merlins magic sleep suit so he doesn’t roll his body, but somehow manages to get his head off of the pillow every night. Disappointing. I had bought a different type of pillow that was cheaper and it was 10x better than this one but sadly we lost it.
customer_reviews.author: Hmk1221

customer_reviews.title: Does not wash well :(
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. It smells when you open it and I was not comfortable having my baby lay on it without washing it first. So I washed this before use on gentle cycle and laid flat to dry. After 24 hours it was no where close to dry. So I decided to try to ring some of that water out. Upon ringing it out the pillow cracked. I have not been able to use this at all. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Talia

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cute, and a must have for baby
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is machine washable, its very easy to maintain. The pillow feels really soft and it comes in an adorable heart shape. It matches perfectly with baby's crib decor. Baby (2 months) feels no discomfort while sleeping on this, so far. Baby developed a flat spot on one side of her head. So far this is helping her lay properly so her head can develop round and even.
customer_reviews.author: Urdxb

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re worried about your babies flat head, buy this ASAP! My 5 month old has been dealing with flatness on one side. We just use the pillow at night, during naps, and when she would lay flat on the floor to play. It’s been about 3 weeks and I’ve noticed a HUGE difference in her head shape. Wish I had taken before and after photos.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Hash

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pillow. Since we just started using it I can’t tell if it is going to improve the flatheadness. BUT the current goal was to place head in different positions (in order not to continue laying on the flat side) and the pillow seems to be helping with it. It helps baby to feel comfortable in those other positions where he would not keep his head before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: It did help our son’s headshape by keeping it from flattening more. He developed a flat spot by 2 months old and the DOC band treatment isn’t administered until 4 months old. The pillow was helpful when his head was on it (he could change positions and come off it during the night). It is machine washable, but it takes a day or so to thoroughly air dry during which time it was too damp to use. We should have purchased 2 to have an alternate.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable pillow for my little one.
customer_reviews.text: My baby deserves all my love and attention. This includes providing the best yet practical things needed for his growth. This product fits the bill. Believe it or not, I can see and feel that my baby likes his new pillow. He'd usually keep on scratching his head due to irritation when he used his old pillows. This isn't the case for this one. The irritation and scratching of his head are completely eliminated resulting to his peaceful and comfortable sleep. His smiles every time he wakes up is a strong testament to it. It's all worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheik B.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly impressed
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My daughter has been sleeping better since using it. I feel better knowing laying her flat on her back won’t affect her head shape. Im honestly surprised how nice the product is. I saw it advertised on Facebook and figured what the hell. I’ll be ordering another for my friends children too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product and Service
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in brand-new condition (unlike some reviews I saw that made me somewhat hesitant to order). Soft, memory foam material. Tested it during baby play mat time. He liked it enough to spend an extra 30 mins playing (Causation? Coincidence?). Seller sent two courtesy emails, to verify receipt of item and inquire about satisfaction, which was appreciated from a customer standpoint. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and supportive baby pillow
customer_reviews.text: This baby pillow is amazing! It is soooo soft and perfect for my baby's head yet very supportive. Its looks like it would be easy to clean. It's also very compact will fit in any diaper bag or medium purse if on the go. Not too wide and would even fit a car seat. Very pretty beige color. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hunny

customer_reviews.title: best buy for baby
customer_reviews.text: just 3 days using it now but can say its perfect, we have another one before but this one is far better, our baby was use to keep his head on one side but it helps to give a support and with this he start taking a sound sleep. its very comfortable.worth it totally!
customer_reviews.author: Meenu

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. The shape of this pillow is good for a forming skull but my baby's head constantly slips off of this. Almost immediately upon bedtime, he falls off of it with one squirm. Also, this pillow doesn't come with a protector and contrary to product description these are NOT washable. The foam inside stiffens and doesn't dry properly, leaving the pillow in an unusable shape. So basically, buy a larger one with a cover or use this one and never get it dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, very well made. It took my daughter some time to get used to it, it restricted her head movement from side to side and made her head always push forward with her chin against her chest, I guess it's a bit too high/thick for a 2 month old.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: My son has been sleeping with this pillow for the last 4 months and did not improved the shape of his head, unfortunately he will have to start to wear the helmet
customer_reviews.author: Mariana G.

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Infant may not always approve.
customer_reviews.text: I like this but not sure if my infant does! He is 3 months old and just started using it...I bought it because I noticed his head is starting to get flat from favoring his right side. He is a feisty baby and only uses it for half the night and then scoots himself off. It’s very soft and thin, safe for the crib and says it’s machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Soft safe pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I bought. My baby, 3 months old, has really helped him. He started to get a flat spot on his head and this helped along with going to a chiropractor. The product says it can be machine washed... it cant! It ruined my first one. I give it 4 stars, because it's not machine washable
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I would have to say that generally any product of this type is a sham as they take advantage of parents concerns in regards to their child's head shape. All baby heads to are developing and growing so different shapes are normal. But hey, if it gives you less stress during a stressful time, make the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No change
customer_reviews.text: My son had a misshapen head after birth and I was hoping this product would work. I didn’t see any difference when I used it for a month plus when I washed it the pillow the shape didn’t go back to normal.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: Bought to help prevent need for helmet after doc told us our daughters head was too flat at 4 months. We tried this- her head never stayed on it for more than 5 min during naps or bedtime. We ended up getting the helmet and it worked great. This may have worked better for us had we started sooner?
customer_reviews.author: brooks

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work with our baby
customer_reviews.text: We had high hopes for this pillow. It probably works well, if your baby stays put. Our little guy (two months old when we started using the pillow) moved off the pillow within minutes of putting him down on it. We ended up finding the baby moon pod pillow, which works a lot better for us.
customer_reviews.author: MMWH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this pillow, its easy to use in crib or on the go in his carseat. Makes me feel so much better when he's laying flat on his back, his head is supported. He's 2 months 13lbs and it's perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable and nicely shaped
customer_reviews.text: My pediatrician recommended this pillow. This is a second pillow for flat head that we’ve tried. Although my baby is not crazy about having her head on a pillow, this one works a lot better that the previous (W WelLifes Baby Pillow) pillow we’ve tried. This pillow is nicely shaped and looks much more comfortable than the other one. Her head is not raised too much like it was with W WelLifes Baby Pillow. She still managed to get her head off of it whenever she can but at least she doesn’t cry when her head is resting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Aga Kar

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this pillow after noticing a slight flat spot developing on our 2 month old's head. Quick shipping and I cannot believe how soft it is! I did a lot of research before ordering to find the best pillow to prevent flat head and this was highly recommended in a blog so I went for it. Happy I did!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Good costumer service, goog pillow
customer_reviews.text: Got it for 2 month niece, the doctor notice some flat head in her righ side, so we decided to buy her this to help her out since she is in a early stage. So far we are happy and glad we decided to go for this pillow out of the others we saw. I will like to add that the business owner took her time to send out emails to make sure I got my order in time!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Otero

customer_reviews.title: Baby pillow for flat head syndrome.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up giving this to my son and dil to use at their home for my grandson. I wasn’t even aware this was a problem w babies until my dil, who is a pediatric nurse practitioner told me about it. This pillow works great and is used daily. Don’t know what I can say about it except that it does what it was supposed to do, keep my grandson from laying on one side all the time, flattening his head on that side. It isn’t too soft, wouldn’t work if it was. More like a piece of memory foam that cradles the head, holding it upright.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle E

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this a few days ago and I love it already! It’s very soft and provides good support and comfort for your babies head! I really wanted it for his bassinet since it’s a little hard and is causing a bit of flat head while he sleeps but we also use it on any other surface where he’s laying down and the surface isn’t as soft. My baby didn’t have bad flat head before but I can see a slight difference since using the pillow already!
customer_reviews.author: Brei

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this pillow bc of the reviews and price. I’m keeping the pillow bc it has encouraged my baby to stop sleeping completely on her left side. In 2 days, my baby’s head has moved more into midline. It doesn’t worry me to have this in the crib with my 4month old bc it is low profile, my child’s head doesn’t slip off and she has good head control. My child only has a slight flatness on the side of the head from sleeping and I feel this is a great tool to prevent further flattening and encourage her natural head shape to return. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: David Bernica

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow that works!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow worked wonderfully for our daughter; when she was about 1 month old, we noticed her head was starting to become cone shaped from constantly sleeping on both sides of her head. It took her 2-3 days to sleep comfortably with the pillow and get used to it, but after that she had no issues at all. By her 2 month visit, her head was much rounder with no flat spots. We continue to use this pillow daily for whenever she is sleeping or laying on her back.
customer_reviews.author: Heena T

customer_reviews.title: Waist of money
customer_reviews.text: Way to small. My babies head rolls right out or off it, and when he is able to stay on the pillow he looks so uncomfortable with it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good but hard to use and keep in place
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is nice and a good idea but not good for a baby that moves her head a lot back and forth. Since you can’t tuck it under her back, when she moves her head, it pops out ALL the time. Kind of annoying. It is a very soft pillow though but doesn’t stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Pizza

customer_reviews.title: Prevent baby flat head
customer_reviews.text: My baby was getting flat head and she was going to have to wear a helmet read the reviews decided to try this instead of spending $1500 on a helmet . 2 months later and my baby head is rounder the top of head still needs a bit of work but no more need for helmet
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Wish this pillow fit my babies head
customer_reviews.text: My baby is 8 months old now and his head is a bit big for the pillow and he didn’t really get the best use out of it ... nor did I see any change of his head shape. I wish this pillow was in different sizes because not every baby has a small skinny head ...
customer_reviews.author: Courtneay J

customer_reviews.title: Superior Standards!
customer_reviews.text: The Pillow is so perfect & w/the pressure of realizing your baby has flathead is abit scary & left me feeling frantic to help her! Non flathead babies too for alternative approach promoting healthy prevention! Can’t wait to see the results!

customer_reviews.title: Too small

customer_reviews.author: K. King

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my baby
customer_reviews.text: Sincerely, it is the best baby pillow that I have ever bought, my baby is 3 months old now but I wish I had bought it since he was a newborn. It has a particular smell when you take it out of the bag but once you wash it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Anais O.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for every babies...
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of this pillow. Unlike other products, the material used is of high quality. The foam looks like it won't sag easily by just the feel of it. The hole in the middle perfectly fits on my baby's head and prevents it form touching the bed. My baby has been having a comfortable sleep since she started using it. I'm glad that her skin doesn't get irritated as it usually happens when using ordinary pillows. Except for diaper change, she has been sleeping continuously as scheduled. The pillow is a must have for every babies out their.
customer_reviews.author: Justineee

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and very easy to carry around and use anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to clean them yet just got them yesterday but I really like them hopefully there will work for my twins they both have head shaped problems from birth But as soon as I put the babies on them they seemed more calm and really enjoyed them

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would Definitely Recommend!

customer_reviews.author: Richard James Rudeen

customer_reviews.title: No more flat head baby

customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: super soft

customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Pavuk

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was starting to get a flat spot, and she would get discomfort when being in a swing or seat for a short time. We are very happy with the product this far!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kohel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this product for a few days now wherever we lay our 2 month old son- usually in the pack and play, and baby seems to like it too. customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job
